segments.text: I'm genuinely worried about what's going to happen next.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water on the floor is expanding rapidly, making it slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's only a matter of time before someone slips and falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And that stool looks like it's about to give way any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy could come crashing down, maybe even pulling the cabinet door with him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me so angry that the woman is so totally unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's right there, but her mind is a million miles away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone should really intervene and prevent these accidents.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This carelessness is going to lead to something truly unpleasant.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can already picture the broken dishes and scraped knees.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The lack of awareness is simply infuriating to witness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a recipe for disaster, and it's all so preventable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to shout at them all to stop.
segments.speaker: PAR
